title: why was Leblanc reverted again?
body: She has 0 counterplay, all she does is burst you with qw until she can kill you. At lv 5 her qw auto does half your hp and to top it all off she has a chain that can hard cc you from a lane away... You can't trade with her, hell you can't even fight her because she because she has 2 flashes on a 10 second cd. If you push her you get ganked. There is 0 counterplay to this champ, so why is this a thing again? Leblac is actually the most cancerous champ in the game tbh.

replies.body:
Because people don't like when a champion needs a whole lot of button presses to get a kill

Though Akali has to press like 15 buttons just to get what LB is back to doing in 3 xd

> [{quoted}](name=ez mental boom,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E7qgHOIq,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-11-06T00:37:56.694+0000)
>
> Because people don't like when a champion needs a whole lot of button presses to get a kill
> 
> Though Akali has to press like 15 buttons just to get what LB is back to doing in 3 xd

LOL! Old LB presses E+Hextech and you're dead.
Apparently they didn't like having to actually use their brains
Her remake was cancer too. Hopefully they just delete her this time.
Her remake made her the best assassin in the game.... best waveclear, best burst, ungodly sustain, even better mobility.... trust me you donâ€™t want the rework back.

> [{quoted}](name=JackMcSnipeyz,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E7qgHOIq,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-11-08T07:09:09.041+0000)
>
> Because people asked for it

nobody sane did

Her rework was not that bad,. There is a reason i started permaban her. She took away all my bad feelings I had for yasuo. Compared to yasuo, she is... something else. After her revert I saw her oneshot my adc in around 0,2-0,3 sec and you couldn't do ANYTHING. How that his better then her rework I don't know. Zeds ult u can flash or zhonya, but you can't flash her chain, at least not when she jumps in that fast. If u are adc, u don't have zhonyas. So what are you gonna do as an adc when lb jumps on u?

> [{quoted}](name=Snowbrand,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E7qgHOIq,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-05T23:45:40.017+0000)
>
> Her rework was not good enough, but still an improvement. There is a reason i started permaban her. She took away all my bad feelings I had for yasuo. Compared to yasuo, she is... something else. After her revert I saw her oneshot my adc in around 0,2-0,3 sec and you couldn't do ANYTHING. How that his better then her rework I don't know. Zeds ult u can flash or zhonya, but you can't flash her chain, at least not when she jumps in that fast. If u are adc, u don't have zhonyas. So what are you gonna do as an adc when lb jumps on u?

There's a reason she's been one of the most popular assassins and mid laners for years and years in soloq and pro play.
